snippet: ISAACSON--Leonard. Lenny, the sweetest, kindest of all human beings, I will miss you forever. My sincerest condolences to the family. Love always, Barbara King 1/3
lead_paragraph: ISAACSON--Leonard. Lenny, the sweetest, kindest of all human beings, I will miss you forever. My sincerest condolences to the family. Love always, Barbara King 1/3
